remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [XML 公布文件格式XML Advertisement File Format](#XMLAdvertisementFileFormat) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件在网页上显示随机选择的广告横幅。Use the control to display a randomly selected advertisement banner on the Web page. 每次刷新页面时，显示的广告都会发生更改。The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page refreshes. 播发信息存储在单独的 XML 文件中。Advertisement information is stored in a separate XML file. 该 XML 文件允许您维护播发列表及其关联属性。The XML file allows you to maintain a list of advertisements and their associated attributes. 特性包括要显示的图像的路径、单击控件时链接到的 URL、图像不可用时要显示的替换文字、关键字和广告的频率。Attributes include the path to an image to display, the URL to link to when the control is clicked, the alternate text to display when the image is not available, a keyword, and the frequency of the advertisement. 此文件中的信息不由控件验证。Information in this file is not validated by the control. 若要防止广告执行恶意脚本，应始终在发布前检查数据，或仅接受来自受信任来源的广告信息。To prevent ads from executing malicious scripts, you should always check the data before releasing it, or accept ad information only from trusted sources. 若要保护广告文件不受未经授权的 Internet 访问，请执行以下一项或多项操作：To secure your advertisement file from unauthorized Internet access, do one or more of the following: - 将其存储在 App_Data 目录中，该目录配置为拒绝对任何类型的文件进行 Internet 访问。Store it in the App_Data directory, which is configured to deny Internet access for files of any type. - 使用非 .xml 扩展名重命名该文件，并在 web.config 中将`HttpForbiddenHandler`扩展名映射到。有关详细信息，请参阅 Machine.config 文件中的部分。Rename the file with an extension that is not .xml, and map the extension to the `HttpForbiddenHandler` in Web.config. For more information, see the section in your Machine.config file. 作为数据源的 XML 文件的替代方法，可以通过回调事件提供广告信息。As an alternative to an XML file as the source of data, it is possible to provide advertisement information through a callback event. 此事件还可以与 XML 文件结合使用，以扩展控件的行为，例如重定向到另一页。This event can also be used in combination with the XML file to extend the behavior of the control, such as redirecting to another page. 有关文件格式的其他信息，请参见属性。 See the property for additional information on the file format. > [!NOTE] > 启用页面缓存后， 不会缓存控件。When page caching is enabled, an control is not cached. 网页刷新时，将选择新的播发。A new advertisement is selected whenever the Web page refreshes. 但是，如果为事件提供事件处理程序，则不会选择新的播发。A new advertisement is not selected, however, if you provide an event handler for the event. ## XML 公布文件格式XML Advertisement File Format 控件使用单独的 XML 播发文件来存储广告信息，例如要显示的图像的位置以及要链接到的页面的 URL。The control uses a separate XML advertisement file to store the advertisement information, such as the location of the image to display and the URL of the page to link to. 控件的属性指定该文件的路径。The property of the control specifies the path to this file. 创建播发文件时，打开和结束``标记分别标记文件的开头和结尾。When creating the advertisement file, opening and closing `` tags mark the beginning and the end of the file, respectively. 打开和关闭``标记均分隔每个播发。Opening and closing `` tags delimit each advertisement. 所有播发都嵌套在开始标记和结束``标记之间。All advertisements are nested between the opening and closing `` tags. 如果文件包含多个``标记，则控件将仅分析``文件中的第一组标记。If the file contains multiple `` tags, only the first set of `` tags in the file will be parsed by the control. 将忽略``所有其他标记。All other `` tags will be ignored. 每个播发的数据元素嵌套在开始标记和结束``标记之间。The data elements for each advertisement are nested between the opening and closing `` tags. 尽管某些数据元素是预定义的（ 如和），但您可以在``标记之间放置自定义元素。Although certain data elements are predefined (such as and ), you can place custom elements between the `` tags. 这些元素将在分析文件时由控件读取。These elements will be read by the control when it parses the file. 然后，将信息传递给 dictionary 属性中的事件。The information is then passed to the event in the dictionary property. 下表列出了为 XML 公布文件预定义的数据元素。The following table lists the data elements that are predefined for the XML advertisement file. |元素Element|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`ImageUrl`|图像文件的绝对或相对 URL （可选）。The absolute or relative URL to an image file (optional).| |`NavigateUrl`|如果用户单击广告，则为要链接到的页面的 URL （可选）。The URL of a page to link to if the user clicks the ad (optional). **注意：** 如果未设置此元素， `HRef`则不会在定位标记上呈现属性。**Note:** If this element is not set, the `HRef` property is not rendered on the anchor tag.| |`Height`|图像的高度（以像素为单位）（可选）。The height of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`Width`|图像的宽度（以像素为单位）（可选）。The width of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`AlternateText`|当属性指定的图像不可用时，显示的文本用于替换图像（可选）。The text display in place of the image when the image specified by the property is not available (optional).

在某些浏览器中，此文本还显示`ToolTip`为广告的。In some browsers, this text also appears as a `ToolTip` for the advertisement.| |`Keyword`|可以按其筛选的播发的类别（例如，"计算机"）（可选）。A category for the advertisement (for example, "computers") that you can filter by (optional).| |`Impressions`|一个数字，指示广告相对于文件中其他广告的旋转计划的重要性（可选）。A number that indicates the importance of the ad in the schedule of rotation relative to the other ads in the file (optional).

数字越大，显示广告的频率越高。The larger the number, the more often the ad is displayed. XML 文件中所有``值的总和不能超过2047999999。The total of all `` values in the XML file cannot exceed 2,047,999,999. 如果是这样，则该控件引发运行时异常。If it does, the control throws a run-time exception.| 下面的示例显示 XML 公布文件的格式。The following example shows the format for the XML advertisement file. ```xml URL of image to display for Advertisement #1 URL of page to link to for Advertisement #1 Text to show as a ToolTip for Advertisement #1 Keyword used to filter for Advertisement #1 Relative importance of Advertisement #1 Custom Data about Advertisement #1 ``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件在网页上显示广告横幅。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to display an advertisement banner on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic adrotator.advertisementfile example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdRotator.AdvertisementFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示包含上一示例的广告信息的 XML 文件的文件格式。The following code example demonstrates the file format for an XML file that contains advertisement information for the previous example. 有关文件格式的详细信息，请参阅成员。For more information on the file format, see the member. ```xml ~/Images/image1.jpg 60 190 http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 ~/Images/image2.jpg 90 90 http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定包含公布信息的 XML 文件的位置。Use the property to specify the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information. 该 XML 文件必须位于同一网站中。The XML file must reside within the same Web site. 出于部署和安全考虑，强烈建议将该文件放在同一个 Web 应用程序中。For deployment and security purposes, it is strongly recommended that you place the file in the same Web application. 仅当应用程序具有足够的信任时，才可以访问位于同一站点上不同应用程序中的 XML 文件。It is only possible to access an XML file that is located in a different application on the same site if the application has sufficient trust. 可将此属性设置为绝对路径或相对于 XML 文件的路径。You can set this property to either an absolute path or a path relative to the XML file. 使用相对路径简化部署。Use a relative path to simplify deployment. 如果使用相对路径，则该路径相对于包含控件的页面或用户控件的位置。If you use a relative path, that path is relative to the location of the page or user control that contains the control. 此属性是可选的。The property is optional. 还可以在事件中以编程方式设置播发。An advertisement can also be programmatically set in the event. 该 XML 文件包含以下预定义的属性。The XML file contains the following predefined attributes. 只有属性`ImageUrl`是必需的。Only the `ImageUrl` attribute is required. |特性Attribute|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`ImageUrl`|要显示的图像的 URL。The URL of the image to display.| |`Height`|图像的高度（以像素为单位）（可选）。The height of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`Width`|图像的宽度（以像素为单位）（可选）。The width of the image, in pixels (optional).| |`NavigateUrl`|单击控件时要导航到的页的 URL。The URL of the page to navigate to when the control is clicked.| |`AlternateText`|图像不可用时要显示的文本。The text to display if the image is unavailable. 在某些浏览器上，此文本显示为工具提示。On some browsers, this text is displayed as a ToolTip.| |`Keyword`|播发的类别。The category for the advertisement. 控件使用此方法来筛选特定类别的播发列表。This is used by the control to filter the list of advertisements for a specific category.| |`Impressions`|一个值，该值指示与 XML 文件中的其他播发相对应的广告显示频率。A value that indicates how often an advertisement is displayed in relation to other advertisements in the XML file.| > [!NOTE] > `ImageUrl` 和 `NavigateUrl` 特性可以是完整的 URL、根相对路径或相对路径。The `ImageUrl` and `NavigateUrl` attributes can be a full URL, a root-relative path, or a relative path. 如果使用根相对路径，则该路径相对于同一个网站。If you use a root-relative path, the path is relative to the same Web site. 如果使用相对路径，则该路径相对于包含广告文件的目录。If you use a relative path, the path is relative to the directory that contains the advertisement file. 还可以通过在 XML 文件中使用自定义标记来包含自定义属性。You can also include custom attributes by using custom tags in the XML file. 所有属性标记都从播发文件进行分析，并将这些值放在字典中。All attribute tags are parsed from the advertisement file, and the values are placed in the dictionary. 您可以使用字典以编程方式访问您的自定义属性。You can use the dictionary to programmatically access your custom attributes. 此文件中的信息不由控件验证。Information in this file is not validated by the control. 若要防止广告执行恶意脚本，应始终在发布前检查数据，或仅接受来自受信任来源的广告信息。To prevent ads from executing malicious scripts, you should always check the data before releasing it, or accept ad information only from trusted sources. 若要保护广告文件不受未经授权的 Internet 访问，请执行以下一项或多项操作：To secure your advertisement file from unauthorized Internet access, do one or more of the following: - 将其存储在 Data 目录中，该目录在 Machine.config 中配置为拒绝对任何类型的文件进行 Internet 访问。Store it in the Data directory, which is configured in Machine.config to deny For more information, see the section in your Machine.config file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定包含公布信息的 XML 文件的位置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the location of the XML file that contains advertisement information.
